short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent youtube interruptions using this simple auto skip tool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Well, if you want to avoid the constant interruptions from YouTube prompts as well as cleaning up the ads on your page, then this is the tool for you.

Disclaimer: This extension DOES NOT SKIP YouTube ads.

So, what is in the package?

1. No more In Page Ads on your YouTube.
2. Automatic Play Now.
3. Auto-accept Still Watching videos.

Yeah, easily focus when using YouTube.

You will love it!
